message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. It's a good offer for you considering the inflation.
I think we can do better than that. Considering inflation, I'll take $55 and you can have $45. It's a more reasonable split.
Okay, let's be reasonable. I'll take $58, you get $42. This deal gets worse for both of us with each round!
I see we're getting closer. I'll take $57, and you can have $43. This way, we both get something before the money loses more value.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  We're losing money with every rejection! I'll take $56, you take $44.  Let's end this before we both lose out!
